mapper.select: select count(*) from chart1 where rrn= #{rrn} and disease BETWEEN (CURRENT_DATE() - interval 3650 day) AND CURRENT_DATE();
select count(*) from chart1 where rrn =#{rrn} and db like #{db};

select docname, dn, mname, db, md, case when md = '(01) 내과' then '내과' when md = '(02) 정형외과' then '정형외과' when md = '(03) 이비인후과' then '이비인후과' when md = '(04) 산부인과' then '산부인과' when md = '(05) 피부과' then '피부과' when md = '(06) 소아과' then '소아과' end as 'speciality',
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS disease,
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS modi,
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(hospital, '%y-%m-%d' ), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(hospital, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(hospital, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS hospital,
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d' ), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS exitd from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rownum, b.* from chart1 b, (select @rownum:=0) as tmp
where mname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where db like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where mname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR db like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by disease desc ) as chartlist
where rrn =#{rrn} and db like #{db} and rownum > (#{pagenum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum}*#{amount}
